title: Persistence
description:
On the 400th episode of RISK!, Tori, Matthew Dicks and Glace Chase share stories about vibrators, arm wrestling and a rent boy's nightmare.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Average White Band, Tori, Perlita, Glace Chase, Melody Gardot, Kevin Allison, Bob Dylan, Matthew Dicks)
